summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from November 13, 2020, regarding the dissemination of the DOJ Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) report on Jeffrey Epstein. The email notes that the media has obtained the report, but it was not officially made public by the Department and still requires DOJ OPR authorization for further distribution.

events.title: FBI internal discussion of DOJ OPR Epstein report
events.description: An internal FBI email is sent regarding the DOJ Office of Professional Responsibility report on Jeffrey Epstein, acknowledging that the media has obtained it but stating it requires DOJ OPR authorization for further dissemination.

keyFacts: The DOJ Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) produced a report on Jeffrey Epstein.
The media had obtained the DOJ OPR Epstein report by November 13, 2020.
The report was not officially made public by the Department of Justice at that time.
Further dissemination of the report required authorization from DOJ OPR.
The document is an internal FBI email discussing the handling of this sensitive report.
